resources.string: #Security\nAll notes are encrypted and data never leaves your device without your permission.

#Privacy\nThere are no trackers, no ads, no internet connections, and no intrusive device permissions. We do not collect, sell, or share your information since Incognoto is entirely free and open source.
#Backups\nFor when lifeâ€™s accidents happen, you can rest assured that your data is available only to you. Store encrypted backups on any cloud while keeping your data locked behind your password.
